transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan ji sir, Dev baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Haan haan basically kal madam se baat hui thi wo services ke regarding to abhi free hai sir to online aa jayenge keh rahe the ki kuch complaint the issue ki irrelevant leads wagera aa rahi hai sir.
Customer: Aap sabse pehle to mere inquiry ka flow dekho.
Executive: Inquiry ka flow dekh pa raha hu sir. Abhi to June mein kitna hai, July mein kitna hai, August mein kitna hai, September mein aur October mein kitna hai, mere ko batao.
Executive: Inquiry June mein hai aapka 165 hai, July mein 230 hai aur August mein 225 hai. September mein 164. Pehle up gaya tha abhi down ho raha hai sir month wise. September, October se down ho raha hai.
Customer: Aisa kyu ho raha hai?
Executive: Aisa product count to same hai. Isme aisa kuch hai kya sir season wise aapka kaam hota hai ya fir demand bhi kam aa rahi hai market mein. Ek minute mein bata de raha hu.
Customer: Aisa kuch nahi hai. Demand to badhti hai na, demand kam thodi na hoti hai.
Executive: Theek hai apna jo hai maine plan upgrade kiya tha uske baad se achcha inquiry aa raha hai. Uske baad se jab se Shailja mam bol rahi hai plan upgrade kar lo tab se IndiaMART ne inquiry ka flow kam kar diya plan upgrade karwane ke liye. Aisa hai kya?
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi aisa nahi hai. Main dekh le raha hu IndiaMART se pure all over matlab kitni inquiry aa rahi hai, kitni generate ho rahi hai. JCB machine JCB mein to hai nahi. Line boring machine mein hai. Sir jo inquiry aayi hai September mein matlab leads ki baat kar raha hu main IndiaMART ne jo pura approve kiya hai 105 aayi hai. September mein October mein 50 hi aayi hui hai. Waha udhar August mein dekh pa raha hu sir main. July, August, September mein high tha matlab IndiaMART mein kafi leads approve hui thi matlab IndiaMART ne kafi leads sellers ko bheja hua tha. But abhi uske baad se thoda down hua hai. Pure IndiaMART ke level pe bata raha hu sir. Aur usse pehle bhi agar December 2024 January 25 se main dekh pa raha hu to 100 100 aa raha tha. Lekin fir beech mein ye down bhi hua line boring machine mein. Line boring haan line boring machine mein 66 tha 91 fir beech mein ghat gaya tha February, March, April mein lagbhag 40 40 by leads sirf IndiaMART ne approve kiya 41 42. Fir 60 May mein 60. Demand matlab IndiaMART verify karta hai na jo leads seller ko sir show hota hai aapki dashboard pe jo lead show hoti hai to verify karta hai to unhone irrelevant show ho rahi hogi fir uske baad dekhiye demand up bhi hua hai matlab July mein achcha 100 chala gaya fir August mein 132 ho gaya September mein 105 ho gaya. Main pure pure all over IndiaMART mein bata raha hu sir. Line boring machine mein jo leads IndiaMART approve karta hai jo aapki profile pe bhejta hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Haan October mein 50 hi main bhi maan raha hu ki July, August, September mein inquiry thi calls thi inquiry bhi thi calls bhi thi aur by leads bhi thi but abhi kam hua hai October se. Is month mein November mein sirf 21 bheja hua hai abhi tak 21 approve hua hai aur aapki profile pe jo aapne consumption kiya hai dekh le raha hu wo bhi. Line boring machine haan. October mein 19 dikha raha hai aur consumption mein.
Executive: To ye hai sir. Theek hai aur dekh pa raha hu leads bhi na sir jo leads aap consume kar rahe hain matlab 30% matlab purani leads consume kar rahe hain theek hai matlab bilkul naye leads pe aap focus hi nahi kar rahe hain matlab active rahiye thoda.
Customer: Aise hi daal aa rahi hai.
Executive: Leads sir aa rahi hai recent se karna hota hai sir. I think Shailja madam ne bhi bataya hoga aapko recent se jo hame leads consumption karna hota hai aur try kijiye same day ki leads consume kijiye sir purani leads mat consume kijiye.
Customer: Are same day mein par aap khud hi bol rahe hain ki abhi tak sirf 21 lead aayi hui hai.
Executive: Haan haan IndiaMART to sab pura wahi bata raha hu pure isliye maine dekha pura IndiaMART ka data maine open kiya ki IndiaMART aapki profile pe issue hai ki IndiaMART ke level pe pura dekh pa raha hu to.
Customer: To aisa kyu hai ki IndiaMART pe leads kam aa rahi hai?
Executive: Ya to aapki kam ho raha hoga demand wo marketing nahi kar raha hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi IndiaMART pe sir matlab wo demand hi kam aa rahi hai wo generate hi kam ho raha hoga aur sabse jyada jo leads abhi aa rahi hai Tata Hitachi.
Customer: All India plan lene ka matlab kya hai? All India ka plan lene ka matlab kya hai? Aur jaise kal maine search kara tha to isme mera all India ka plan hai na?
Executive: Ek minute. Haan preferred star haan all India ka plan hai sir apna.
Customer: Sir aap mere se upar local players ko de rahe ho. Maine abhi Kolkata se search kiya to Kolkata ka player mere se upar kyu dikh raha hai jab mera all India ka plan hai to.
Executive: To all India kyunki uska sir wo bhi ho na kya pata leader ka hoga ya fir aap se bhi upar preferred star nahi hai.
Customer: Leader nahi hai.
Executive: Kyunki iske upar bhi I am leader aata hai leader aata hai. Ek minute dekh le raha hu star aur star se upar normal lead normal wo aa rahe the.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Matlab MDC TrustSeal ke aa rahe the. To kya pata kyunki local mein kya hota hai local mein kabhi kabhi wo unko hi wo aa jate hain matlab jaise particular Gorakhpur ka Gorakhpur ka koi client hai to Gorakhpur mein TrustSeal chal raha hai MDC chal raha hai. To waise hi profile mein isme aapka leads ka bhi wo hoga ki kis kis city mein aapne leads consumption kiya hai main dekh le raha hu to waha pe major city mein aapka Chennai, Pune, Mumbai abhi is city mein aap dikh rahe hain sir matlab kitne city mein 76 city mein.
Customer: Agar mera all India ka hai to all India mein dikhna chahiye na.
Executive: Haan haan all India mein dikhna chahiye par wo bhi hota hai ki by leads consumption pe hota hai sir. Theek hai.
Executive: By leads Kolkata ki aap baat kar rahe hain na Kolkata dekh rahe hain aapki list mein ho kyunki waha ki by leads generate hogi jab aap waha ki by leads consume karenge fir automatic profile aapko waha pe aa jayegi sir.
Customer: Aisa to nahi hai by leads generate nahi hogi.
Executive: Sir by leads generate hogi waha ki by leads aap consume karenge to automatic waha pe aap dikh jayenge. Abhi sabse jyada aap Chennai, Pune, Mumbai.
Customer: Na optimize karwao optimize karwao sir yaar lead sahi nahi aa rahi hai. Listing website aur mera pura wapas optimize karwa ke aap dekho aap isko kaise best karke rank kar sakte ho.
Executive: Bilkul sir bilkul haan ispe karte hain work. Theek hai.
Customer: Aur catalog thoda push karwao.
Executive: Haan catalog mein hai thode se works hain sir ek fancy ki poll hai theek hai. Thode se hain mapping karni hai aur isme dekh pa raha hu jyada se jyada aap leads wo not relevant mark kar rahe hain sir to usko mat kijiye aur.
Customer: Mere ko sirf line boring machine ki leads chahiye.
Executive: Hmm. Boring machine ki bhi nahi chahiye only mere ko line boring machine ki leads chahiye aap mere ko wo optimize karwa ke do.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai sir karte hain ispe. Theek hai.
Executive: Ji. To ispe karte hain kaam baki kuch cheeze matlab change add karne ke liye category main ispe karta hu aur kal wahi madam ka call aaya hua tha to maine unse bhi baat kiya tha. Ho gaya. Nahi ho raha hai yaar iska na mapping correct karwao kyunki flow dekho na 200 inquiry se na 100 ke niche aa gaya hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Haan inquiry last time kafi kafi low hua hai sir dekh pa raha hu. Theek hai to jo maine bataya na thoda sa haan ye mere side se haan. Ji ji ji jo mere side se hai sir main uspe karta hu aur jo aapki side se ho raha hai na ki same day ki leads agar aapki team hai to unko bhi boliye same day ki leads consume kare aur recent section se jyada se jyada active rahe matlab har 10 minute mein 2 minute 5 minute mein recent pe click kare theek hai jaise hi leads aati hai to uspe consume click karke consume kar le.
Customer: Theek hai recent se hum log consume karenge aap isko escalate karo ki meri leads ekdam 50% se bhi kam ho gaya hai mera.
Executive: Theek hai sir theek hai. Isko aap escalate karke na aap iska mapping karwao jo bhi matlab necessary action karwa ke mujhe wapas mera inquiry ka flow 200 plus chahiye.
Customer: Theek hai sir haan ispe kaam karte hain. Aap dekho isme kya kya necessary action hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir theek hai.
Executive: Baki sir ispe customer care pe I think kiya hua tha mera number ek bar note kar lijiye nahi to main abhi WhatsApp pe aapko pin kar de raha hu theek hai mera number save kar lijiyega Dev naam hai. Theek hai. Aapko abhi mail pe ek main wo bhejunga feedback bhejunga please uspe positive mark kijiyega theek hai main ispe kaam karta hu hai na.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is receiving irrelevant buyleads.

- Inquiry flow has decreased significantly.

- Local players are ranked higher than customer.

- Wants only line boring machine leads.



Resolution:

- Executive checked the inquiry flow.

- Executive confirmed the all India plan.

- Executive explained the by-leads consumption process.

- Executive assured to optimize the profile.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will pin his number on WhatsApp.

- Executive will send a feedback form via mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, optimization, ranking, catalog
